Blog.post: In dubai i saw the 4th genration ipod 20g for 1350 ed (108 kd) in virgin megastore. In kuwait the 3rd genration will cost you more than that so iwant to know why virgin megastore in kuwait bring everything after dubai and sell it more what it cost in dubai. its that in kuwait that some people buy every thing without wait or even if they know they can find a new one cheaper.

Yesterday i was in marina mall i saw kiosk in virgin for new company kuwait cable vision and luxsat they have new service its video on demand they give you a box remote with keyboard and mouse and joystick. and you can use the box for movies games internet on your tv every month they will put 50 movies and all of them new and the same time the dvd release in US and you can watch dvd but the problem is i told here i want to know the movies available now she told me when you buy the box they will put it there and you choose the movie you want to watch and then they will take some credit from you i dont know how its work but i go to this website urlLink www.luxsat.com its company in Luxembourg and kuwait cable vision coraprate with them to offer this service in kuwat . but i dont know how to buy something and i dont know what i can watch on it cause there is no guide . and you can watch nilesat channel and you can ask for music you want watch

Today i will travel to Dubai for fun , buisness and to forget my stocks in kuwait stock market . I like this city every time you go there you will find new thing new building new services. really they build this city. You can pay your trafic ticket from machine located in city centre, thats good. i hope in kuwait they put this thing, here if you want to pay speed ticket you wait and wait. In Dubai any one want to invest his money in big project they will give him land and help , someone told me that the formula one in Bahrain first they want to build it in kuwait but after late answer from the govenment they go to Bahrain just think what the good thing for kuwait if its done here. See you soon

Hi i want to change my template but i dont know what to choose and maybe i choose one and someone have so if i change it and someone want me to change it just tell and i want some advise which one to choose

They will build an airport in al-abdly i think they should build AL-Abdly then thinking of build an airport there. I dont think that we need a new airport and now its far away from the city urlLink http://www.alwatan.com.kw/default.aspx?page=2&topic=275776

Every week or more or less i will put a list for new dvd realeses in kuwait but not dvd copies from cinema or from videotapes the original dvd or copied from original dvd and remember there is no cut scene in this dvds and there is arabic subtitle here we go: 1-stuck on you urlLink http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0338466/ (avilable at virgin mega store or dream video) 2- secret window urlLink http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0363988/ (dream video) and you can go to( cinema hih) 3-butterfly effect urlLink http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0289879/ 4-50 first dates urlLink http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0343660/ (dream video) and cinema what a bad cinema show movie available on dvd i like this movie and i like all adam sandler movies anger managment , mr deed. You can find spider man 2 and all new movies on dvd but in not good quality. The good thing about virgin megastore they sell dvds movies and there is no cut scene yes its Full movie (maybe if cancun guy -tabtabae- know he will declare war againest virgin megastore , marina mall and starbuck and all brands in marina mall even bluetooth) but he wish! you know him by saying they ruin shabab mind and the other stuff so see you with new releases next week
I recieved email with this pics is this pics for a dead man hanged or he killed him self true or its just kids put toy or something and hanged it there?

I want to know what this ad for a guy hand and only this word ( fieh kuwity ?) the ad in bad design and its all over the streets and newpaper what fieh kuwaity mean. my friend told me maybe they mean: (fieh kuwaity ma 3laih aksa6?) lol but maybe they mean good thing for kuwait

kill bill 2 available now on dvd i checked amazon site and its available there i dont know now order it from there or wait 2 months or more and buy it from virgin megastore or another video store i like kill bill volume 1 and i cant wait to watch volume 2 and i dont like to watch it on kuwait cinema cause there is alot of scene that has been cut and after advise from ziad urlLink http://zaydoun.blogspot.com/ he wrote about it. i like the soundtrack in volume 1 and i hope the sound track and music in volume 2 be same or better. i like urlLink Quentin Tarantino movies pulp fiction (1994) urlLink http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0110912/ Jackie Brown (1997) urlLink http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0119396/ urlLink

today in alrai alam newspaper there is an article about a video for a policeman wearing his uniform and he drink and dance and he removed his police number from his uniform and covered his face. and this video everybody send it by bluetooth the funny think that the authority said that they know him and will catch him i dont know how but there is no evidence that they will know him. urlLink http://www.alraialaam.com/11-08-2004/ie5/par.htm and i remember about old video for policeman hit a man and a picture for a girl or gay i dont know they catch him and took a picture for him near a police car and they sent it for everybody by bluethooth. i know we have here some funny policemans

resturants in kuwait i like : burger king (yes) i like it whopper sandwich tgi fridays chicken mushroom zaater in marina mall chinees and lebanon food and other fast food resturants. but burger king my favorite . i like club sandwich but i cant find good place in kuwait make it good

the first private channel will broadcast from kuwait its alrai tv and its belong to jassim bodai (alrai alam) newspaper owner but its like a surprise cause its come without any one talk about it . and i think the channel will show news talk show and some kuwaiti drama and comedy series and they will broadcast from the ministry of information building in salmiya near souk alsalmiya and salmiya fire station maybe the minisrty will rent the building for the alrai tv its good to see private tv station broadcast from kuwait. you can watch alrai tv on nilesat. thats the start for private channel to broadcast from kuwait after the govement said ok for media city .

if you want to buy and sell stock in kuwait market and usa market while sit in your house you can from internet with the service from urlLink www.alawsat.com now i just trade in kuwait market cause its small and im new to this thing. and i make good profit but now i stuck but my friend told me to change to us market cause there is more company than kuwait and the market change in 10 minutes not like kuwait sometime you wait for weeks for you stock to raise. the problem with stock market that all the time you think about it and you look at the moniter and you hope that the stock you bought go up. so i hope tomorrow green . good forums for kuwait and us stock marekts in arabic urlLink http://www.indexsignal.com/vb/ urlLink http://www.alnwady.com/stock/forumdisplay.php?f=1
